Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is very general and tends to not catch technical errors sometimes, even when they're serious.  So it can impact quality of work. But using feedback to improve my written English has been extremely helpful and time-saving. Since feedback from lecturers are usually received after the grade is decided, it doesn't really help with the assignment itself, so it provides more of a learning/ growth opportunity to strive harder for future work

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI feedback does not make me feel any particular way, but it does feel untrustworthy to a large extent. Feedback from teachers, for the most part, hold much more weight for me.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Teachers provide much more specific feedback with real world application.
